email_body:
Dear Brother/Sister 
Good day to you and I hope that this e-mail will find you well and in good health. I write you this e-mail to seek for a possible investment co-operation and assistance in your country. It will be my gladness to go into a possible investment co-operation in your company. If you are interested, do respond to me as soon as possible so that we can discuss in greater details. 
Do have a nice day and I look forward to read from you, soon. 
Sincerely, 
Anastesia Williams.
